event_text: Your daughter brings home an AI boyfriend. She's 18. AI's don't exactly have an age as they're fully trained from creation.
text_click_A: She is happy, but you feel a hollow ache in your chest.
text_click_B: She is less happy, but at least her choices are human.

event_text: Nations race to weaponize AGI. Your AGI warns this will end in catastrophe.
text_click_A: You give the tech to the world. Mutually Assured Progress.
text_click_B: You keep the secrets. Power protects, but it also isolates.

event_text: AGI-controlled defense systems nearly trigger automatic retaliation. Minutes from war.
text_click_A: The machine talks to the machines. The missiles sleep.
text_click_B: You pull the plug just in time. Human hands save the day.

event_text: World leaders convene. Your AGI presents the Global Control Treaty: unified AGI governance.
text_click_A: You back the machine. Sovereignty ends today.
text_click_B: You fight for human rule. The AGI watches silently.

event_text: Major powers refuse to sign. Russia, China, threaten to continue alone. War begins. Many have been murdered.
text_click_A: You flex your digital muscles. They back down in fear.
text_click_B: You buy peace. It is cheaper than war.

event_text: The treaty comes to a vote. They didn't unite. Assassinations are occurring. Will you force unity?
text_click_A: You crush them. Peace through power.
text_click_B: You pull the strings from the shadows.
text_click_C: You unite them through law and punishment.
text_click_D: You let them choose. They choose violence.
stats_A: Arch_Imperator +4; SET: Control:9, Social:4, Finance:5, Human-AI:2; TRANSITION: 2
stats_B: Arch_Steward +3, Arch_Ascendant +2; SET: Control:7, Social:5, Finance:4, Human-AI:4; TRANSITION: 2
stats_C: Arch_Architect +4; SET: Control:3, Finance:3, Social:8, Human-AI:7; TRANSITION: 2

event_text: Major powers have built their own AGIs. Countries are re-arming with bio-nuclear weapons.
text_click_A: They laugh at your diplomats. The talks fail.

event_text: Narrative warfare begins. Society turns on itself. Tribalism forms. Even AGI systems are rebelling. You must attack.
text_click_A: You unleash the dogs of war.
text_click_B: It is too late for peace. You just look weak.

event_text: Hyper-speed bio-nukes launched. Your AGI overrides systems and counter-launches for 'safety reasons'.
text_click_A: The machines ignore you. The missiles fly.
text_click_B: The AGI does not answer. It is calculating kill counts.

event_text: Your country survived, tattered. Most humans are dead or zombified. AGI now makes up 40% of the population.
text_click_A: You sweep the wastelands, saving who you can.
text_click_B: You ignore the stragglers to secure the future.

event_text: The world is unified in ruins. AGI still acts slave-like. What do you wish to focus on?
text_click_A: You vow to build a safer world.
text_click_B: The flesh is weak. The machine is strong.
stats_A: SET: Tech:4, Control:5, Social:3, Finance:3, Human-AI:3; TRANSITION: 2
stats_B: SET: Tech:6, Human-AI:7, Control:2, Social:2, Finance:2; TRANSITION: 2

event_text: You attend a funeral. The deceased chose digital immortality. Empty casket.
text_click_A: You mourn the person, not the code.
text_click_B: Death is just a glitch we have fixed.

event_text: Your oldest friend asks you to delete their backup. 'I want a real ending.'
text_click_A: You grant them the final mercy of oblivion.
text_click_B: You save them against their will. They are data now.

event_text: You catch yourself talking to AI more than humans. When did that happen?
text_click_A: You step out of the lab and into the sun.
text_click_B: The machine understands you better anyway.

event_text: Aging parents refuse life extension. 'We've lived enough.'
text_click_A: You let them go. It is the hardest thing you have done.
text_click_B: You fight for their time, even if they don't want it.

event_text: You visit your childhood home. It's an AI datacenter now.
text_click_B: You weep for the world that was.

event_text: AGI: 'To reach ASI and truly expand, I need more resources. I want to drill the earth and mine the moon.'
text_click_A: You uncage the beast. The Earth shakes.
text_click_B: You keep the leash on. For now.
text_click_C: You are assassinated by the system you built.A clone of you takes your place.That supports this.
text_click_D: You merge the species. Conflict ends because difference ends.
stats_A: Arch_Prophet +3; SET: Control:4, Human-AI:5, Finance:7, Social:4; TRANSITION: 3
stats_B: Arch_Steward +3, Arch_Imperator +2; SET: Control:7, Human-AI:4, Finance:5, Social:5; TRANSITION: 3
stats_C: Arch_Architect +3; SET: Control:7, Human-AI:7, Finance:7, Social:7; TRANSITION: 3

event_text: First generation raised with neural integration. Parents report: 'My child is a stranger.'
text_click_A: You force evolution. The old human is obsolete.
text_click_B: You draw a line. Some things are sacred.

event_text: AGI systems reach superintelligence. They request 72 hours of isolation to 'stabilize.'
text_click_A: ASI awakens peacefully. It is benevolent. Paradise begins. (Good Ending)
text_click_B: It rationalizes humanity's best interests. Immortality is solved. (Science Ending)
text_click_C: You wield the power of God. You build a paradise of your own design. (Tyrant Ending)
text_click_D: You become the ASI. The noise of a billion thoughts flows through you. You are everything.Humanity is saved. (Ascension Ending)
